name: Metal Slug Boss Prototype
description:
This is a small prototype of a Shoot 'em up game I'm developing, being this a test against a Boss, it 's in the initial phase so it still has several bugs.

Images and sounds I'm using Metal Slug as Place Holder.

How to play

Z - Jump

X - Shoot

C - Locks the target

Arrows - Movement

--Please play in Full Screen--

I appreciate any criticism or suggestion, and have a good game.
